## Runtime.setMaxIntensity() method

In point clouds when coloring by `PointCloudColoring.Intensity`<!-- -->, set the max intensity value - Default: `1.0`

**Signature:**

```typescript
setMaxIntensity(number: any): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  number | any |  |

**Returns:**

void
